Name: INV Changeover 4.5.3.9
checklistText:
<size=21>4.5.3.9 Inverter Changeover</size>

				WARNING
		Ensure at least one inv on each ac bus at all times (if 
		available).
		
	a. 	Dual Inv (No. 1 & 2) Oper
Panel 3 	AC2 RSET 						- OFF
			INV 2 							- MNB
			INV 1 AC2 						- OFF
			INV 2 AC2 						- on (up)
			AC2 RSET 						- RSET
Panel 1, 3, 122:
			MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) 		- on
			MASTER ALARM pb/lt 			- push
			MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) 		- out
Panel 2		C/W lts (all) 					- out
			Perform AC Voltage Check, 4.5.3.4

	b. 	Single Inv Oper
			AC2 RSET 						- OFF
			INV 2 							- OFF
			INV 2 AC2 						- OFF
			INV 1 AC2 						- on (up)
			AC2 RSET 						- RSET
Panel 1, 3, 122:
			MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) 		- on
			MASTER ALARM pb/lt 			- push
			MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) 		- out
Panel 2		C/W lts (all) 					- out
			Perform AC Voltage Check, 4.5.3.4

	c. 	Stby Inv (No. 3) Check or Oper
Panel 3		AC2 RSET 						- OFF
			INV 2 							- OFF
			INV 3 							- MNB
			INV 2 AC2 						- OFF
			INV 3 AC2 						- on (up)
			AC2 RSET 						- RSET
Panel 1, 3, 122:
			MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) 		- on
			MASTER ALARM pn/lt 			- push
			MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) 		- out
Panel 2		C/W lts (all) 					- out
Panel 3		Perform AC Voltage Check, 4.5.3.4
			If stby inv check
				Go to dual inv (No. 1 & 2) oper, 4.5.3.9a, & set
					INV 3 					- OFF
